_drawerOrder.title: Drawer Order
_drawerOrder.description: Determines the order in which this extension appears as a drawer item. You only need to set this if your course has more than one extension that appears in the drawer (e.g. glossary, resources) and you want to control the order in which they are listed when the drawer is opened.

_contentWordBeginsPhraseWord.title: A word in the content begins the search phrase word

_contentWordContainsPhraseWord.title: A word in the content contains the search phrase word

_contentWordEqualsPhraseWord.title: A word in the content equals the search phrase word

_phraseWordBeginsContentWord.title: A word in the content starts with the search phrase word

_previewWords.title: Preview words
_previewWords.description: The number of words taken from either side of the matching word. Defaults to 10.

_previewCharacters.title: Preview characters
_previewCharacters.description: If the number of preview words cannot be found, then use x number of characters. Defaults to 30.

_showFoundWords.title: Show found words
_showFoundWords.description: Show found words under the search results.

_showHighlights.title: Show highlights
_showHighlights.description: Show the yellow highlights on search results.

_hideComponents.title: Hide Components
_hideComponents.description: A comma-separated list of components which will be ignored by the search algorithm

_hideTypes.title: Hide Types
_hideTypes.description: A comma-separated list of types which will be ignored by the search algorithm

_ignoreWords.title: Ignored words
_ignoreWords.description: A comma-separated list of words which will be ignored by the search algorithm

_minimumWordLength.title: Minimum word length
_minimumWordLength.description: Minimum number of characters which must be entered before triggering a search

_frequencyImportance.title: Frequency importance
_frequencyImportance.description: Extra points for a repeat match

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search box

noResultsMessage.title: No results message
noResultsMessage.description: Message shown when a search returns no results. Defaults to 'No results found'

awaitingResultsMessage.title: Processing results message
awaitingResultsMessage.description: Message between having enough characters to search and having search results (More than 2 characters per word). Defaults to 'Formulating results...'
